title: Fish in farm dams
creator_credit: New South Wales Film Corporation and John Gacy
brief_description: Shows aspects of the native warm water fish breeding program being carried out at the Island Fisheries Research Station, Narrandera, NSW. Also looks at the work being done by State Fisheries and the Water Resources Commission which benefits farmers.
creator_credit_for_label: New South Wales Film Corporation and John Gacy
